short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to track price changes of the Most Popular cryptocurrencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension allows you to track price changes of Most Popular Cryptocurrencies.
This extension is Powered by Crypto.com.

 With this extension you can also see the total market cap.

You can easily set price alert for Bitcoin or some other cryptocurrency. You can see cryptocurrency prices in AUD, CAD, CHF, CNY, EUR, GBP, INR, RUB, IDR, PLN, NZD, KRW, MYR, TRY.

To start using this extension, you can click on the extension icon with right mouse button and then choose options. On the options page, you will be able to choose coins that you wish to track, the currency in which you want to see coin price (BTC price is always visible) and to set price alerts for any available coin. To set price alert, simply click on bell icon and then you will be able to set a price alert for that coin. If you don't want to use one field when setting alert, leave that field empty.

Coin prices that are displayed in BTC are set to 8 digits after the decimal point. If coin price is less than a 1, it will be fixed to 8 digits after the decimal point. Otherwise it will be fixed to 4 digits after the decimal point.

----------------------
This extension is for information purposes only. I cannot guarantee the accuracy of the data provided by this extension. I will not be held responsible for any damage arising from the use of this extension.
----------------------
